body:
After discussion in #8868, this is to track bumping the minimum required Boost version.

The current minimum required Boost version is [1.20.0](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/build-aux/m4/ax_boost_base.m4#L75).
The long term goal is to move away from Boost entirely, and is tracked in the [Boost -> C++11 Project](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/projects/3). 

We currently use the following Boost [components](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/depends/packages/boost.mk#L22):
- Chrono, Filesystem, Program_options, System, Thread, Test
### Filesystem:

V1 - (boost version) [1.30.0](http://www.boost.org/users/history/version_1_30_0.html)
V2 - [1.34.0](http://www.boost.org/users/history/version_1_34_0.html)
V3 - [1.44.0](http://www.boost.org/users/history/version_1_44_0.html)
### Chrono:

V2.0.0 - [1.52.0](http://www.boost.org/users/history/version_1_52_0.html)
- [#7381](http://svn.boost.org/trac/boost/ticket/7381) C++11 compliance: unresolved symbol when assigning a constexpr duration to a non-const local variable.

V1.2.3 - [1.51.0](http://www.boost.org/users/history/version_1_51_0.html)
- Documentation & C++11
### Thread:

V4.1.0 - [1.54.0](http://www.boost.org/users/history/version_1_54_0.html)
- [#7285](http://svn.boost.org/trac/boost/ticket/7285) C++11 compliance: Allow to pass movable arguments for call_once.

Thread is on the way out in #8631.
### Test:

Work has started on replacing this in #8670.
title: Bump minimum required Boost version
